blocks.name: lt2addrd
blocks.content: If the right-hand side of a 'less than' relationship is an addition, then we can express the left-hand side as an addition, too, where each term is respectively less than each term of the original right side. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm lt2addrd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cr, w3a(wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s1), clt, c2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl113anc(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cr, w3a(wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s1), clt, c2)))), wcel(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), cr), wcel(co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), cr), wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)))), wbr(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), clt, c1), wbr(co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), clt, c2))
  resubcld(c1, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), w0)
  resubcld(c2, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), w0)
  rehalfcld(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), w0)
  resubcld(co(c1, caddc, c2), c0, w0)
  3eqtrrd(c0, co(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2))), co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, co(co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2))), co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0)), w0)
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2))), co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, co(co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2))), co(c1, caddc, co(co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2))), co(c1, caddc, co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)))), w0)
  oveq2d(c1, caddc, co(co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2))), w0)
  subsub4d(c2, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), w0)
  subadd23d(c1, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), w0)
  subcld(c2, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), w0)
  halfcld(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), w0)
  addsubassd(c1, c2, co(co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), w0)
  eqeltrd(co(co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), cc, co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), w0)
  oveq2d(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, co(co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), w0)
  2halvesd(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), w0)
  subcld(co(c1, caddc, c2), c0, w0)
  nncand(co(c1, caddc, c2), c0, w0)
  addcld(c1, c2, w0)
  recnd(c1, w0)
  recnd(c2, w0)
  recnd(c0, w0)
  ltsubrpd(c1, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), w0)
  ltsubrpd(c2, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2), w0)
  rphalfcld(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wcel(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), crp), wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, c2)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, c2)), wcel(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), crp)), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c2), cr))
  readdcld(c1, c2, w0)
  difrp(c0, co(c1, caddc, c2))
  rspc2ev(s0, s1, co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), cr, co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), cr, w3a(wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)))), wbr(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), clt, c1), wbr(co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), clt, c2)), w3a(wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s1), clt, c2)), w3a(wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, cv(s1))), wbr(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s1), clt, c2)))
  3anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2))), wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s1), clt, c2), wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, cv(s1))), wbr(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), clt, c1))
  eqeq2d(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1)), co(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2))))
  oveq1(cv(s0), co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, cv(s1))
  breq1(cv(s0), co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), clt, c1)
  3anbi13d(wceq(cv(s1), co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2))), wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, cv(s1))), wbr(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s1), clt, c2), wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)))), wbr(co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), clt, c2))
  eqeq2d(c0, co(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, cv(s1)), co(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2))), wceq(cv(s1), co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2))))
  oveq2(cv(s1), co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc)
  breq1(cv(s1), co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), clt, c2)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.w3a.s(s0, wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, cv(s1))), wbr(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s1), clt, c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, co(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, cv(s1)))
  diff.co.s(s0, co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, cv(s1))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), clt, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2))
  diff.co.s(s0, co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)
  diff.co.s(s0, co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, caddc, c2)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cv(s1), clt, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.w3a.s(s1, wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)))), wbr(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), clt, c1), wbr(co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), clt, c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c0, co(co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2))))
  diff.co.s(s1, co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, co(c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), clt, c1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, co(c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)), clt, c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, c2, cmin, co(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2))
  diff.co.s(s1, co(co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0), cdiv, nat2)
  diff.co.s(s1, co(c1, caddc, c2), cmin, c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, caddc, c2)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.cdiv.s(s1)
  diff.nat2.s(s1)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
}
